TA RE PIOLA

Quand on joue à CS:S, on ne voit pas les heures défilées. Il y a tellement de choses à faire selon les serveurs. Le niveau de skill a développer est aussi quelque chose de vraiment sympa, il faut pas mal s'entraîner pour avoir un niveau correct et comprendre les mécaniques comme il faut et c'est plutôt plaisant de se sentir prendre du niveau. En bref, c'est vraiment un des "must have" du fps. Je le conseil vivement.

Игра очень хорошая рекомендую всем

I can't really recommend this game, if there was a "middle" I would select that. Would I recommend this game? Sure, if you like playing with idiots who think they are hilarous when they are just really annoying, or playing with the worst controller known to humanity a keyboard. 

The game over all just seemed like there no was no work put into it. The only reason why I bought this game is so I don't have to go through all the pain to get the right texture packs for garry's mod. The guns are simple desgin, and you don't even have to do anything to earn them. The graphics aren't great, I would say they are the best of the worst and the worst of the best. I hate any game that you HAVE to play online, because I don't always want to play with 10 year olds, or teenagers with guns. 

Would I recommend this? No, no, I wouldn't it seemed like it was just a game that was milked to get more money, I mean the company who made this is doing a great job, why did they put this game out then? Once again, to milk us for money. No, don't buy this game. Buy something actually worth while. 

My score for this game. 35/100

A refreshingly simple shooter that relies more on pure skill than anything else(Much like the somewhat identical original).
 A remake of the original Counter Strike using the source engine that has more maps, ragdoll physics, way better graphics and textures, and gets rid of the unnecessary task of buying ammo for your guns.

Also, good for playing if you're temporarily stuck with a computer that can't run Counter Strike: Global Offensive.

(I'm terrible at this game by the way)

Que decir de Counter Strike:source,desde sus inicios esta saga me enamoro con un simple MOD de HALF LIFE,gracias a aquella modificacion,la gente pudo testear un verdadero shooter, ya no se hacen juegos como este Counter Strike,si pillais de rebajas esta obra maestra no dudeis ni un solo segundo, lanzad la cartera a la pantalla al grito de ¡SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!
Desde entonces, nunca salgo de casa sin mi Bomb Defusal Kit
muito bom

CS is nice but there is the constant problem of "BOT-cheats". When playing against bots you drop dead a certain percentage of time when killing a bot (you kill a bot and it then says the bot killed you, the "dead" bot runs away and you lie back) - in particular if you blind them with FB's first... Annoying!
Supposedly a problem since CS 1.x days due to the bot server being zero-lag (being able to shoot and kill you after you have fired you shot, and since you are dead your ahot is then canceled - or something like that)

С этой замечательной игрой у меня связано очень очень многое... В ней я провел все свое детство, даже когда у меня не было собственного пк, я бегал играть к систре (мне было 6 лет) и даже когда у меня появился свой комп, первая игра у меня была это Counter-Strike: Source, и в ней я провел не одну тысячу часов... Было очень много ярких моментов и эмоций. Спасибо тебе КСС <3

Well CS:GO is really fun especially when you play competitively, it's going to be hard for COD players since everything is different from Cod but I suggest whoever buys this game should play it constantly, It's worth it. Either your good or your bad. You have the chance to join CS:GO competitive teams or make your own and that's what I like. And the weapon side of CS:GO - I'm very in love with almost every skin in CS:GO and I'm glad they came to a decision to add those when they first made CS:GO. Over all it's one of the best shooter games I've ever played and you should try it out.

Same game as CS:GO, just better recoil and spray patterns (not so spastic, random, and fuxxall when it comes to the angles that they shoot out of your gun) and of course spraypaints. Still recommend even if you have CS:GO.
